thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Keith Landers
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Keith Landers

author: Keith Landers
title: Keith Landers
text:
Had been thinking of getting solar for a while but thought it was not worth it. I started seeing adds on tv selling 5kw solar units for $4200 fully installed. Then I came across solar Quote: s and with all the helpfull information I was able to make an informed decision on inverters etc.
Was given 3 reputable companys all 3 were very helpful. We decided on 1 company because they were using power optimizers and had a good price.
